name: Fallen Evolution
description:
There are 4 classes that you can choose from. Warrior, Magician, Assassin, Ranger each have their own unique play-style.

There are many skills such as Mining, Fishing, and Woodcutting that you can advance to unlock higher tier gear and loot
Kill monsters to grind Experience and unlock Levels to assign Stat Points to further progress your character! Take on Dungeons
and Bosses solo or in a group to craft unique and interesting items!


Character Progression

Loot/Items

Combat

Mounts

Quests
